create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS", "EDW", "W") ?> ( ACTION_TS DATE, CUSTOMER_ID NUMBER(11), ACCOUNT_ID NUMBER(11), ACCOUNT_STATUS VARCHAR2(20), BROKER_ID NUMBER(11,0) )

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG", "EDW_STAGE", "A") ?> ( ACCOUNT_KEY NUMBER, BROKER_KEY NUMBER, CUSTOMER_KEY NUMBER, ACTIVITY_DATE_KEY NUMBER, ACTIVITY_TYPE VARCHAR2(20), ACTIVITY_DATE DATE, BATCH_ID NUMBER, ACTIVITY_COUNT NUMBER, ACCOUNT_ID NUMBER, BROKER_ID NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID NUMBER )

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_F", "EDW", "A") ?> ( ACCOUNT_KEY NUMBER, BROKER_KEY NUMBER, CUSTOMER_KEY NUMBER, ACTIVITY_DATE_KEY NUMBER, ACTIVITY_TYPE VARCHAR2(20), ACTIVITY_DATE DATE, BATCH_ID NUMBER, ACTIVITY_COUNT NUMBER )

SELECT CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACTION_TS AS ACTION_TS , CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID , CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID AS ACCOUNT_ID , (CASE CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACTION_TYPE WHEN 'NEW' THEN 'New Customer' WHEN 'ADDACCT' THEN 'New Account' WHEN 'CLOSEACCT' THEN 'Close Account' END) AS ACCOUNT_STATUS , (FIRST_VALUE(CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.BROKER_ID IGNORE NULLS) over (PARTITION BY CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACTION_TS ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)) AS BROKER_ID FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "CUSTOMER", "Trade_Data", "D") ?> CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS WHERE (CUS_EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS.ACTION_TYPE in ('NEW','ADDACCT','CLOSEACCT') )

INSERT INTO <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS", "EDW", "W") ?> ( ACTION_TS, CUSTOMER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_STATUS, BROKER_ID ) VALUES( <?=":"+"ACTION_TS" ?> , <?=":"+"CUSTOMER_ID" ?> , <?=":"+"ACCOUNT_ID" ?> , <?=":"+"ACCOUNT_STATUS" ?> , <?=":"+"BROKER_ID" ?> )

INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL */ INTO <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG", "EDW_STAGE", "D") ?> ( ACCOUNT_KEY , BROKER_KEY , CUSTOMER_KEY , ACTIVITY_DATE_KEY , ACTIVITY_TYPE , ACTIVITY_DATE , BATCH_ID , ACTIVITY_COUNT , ACCOUNT_ID , BROKER_ID , CUSTOMER_ID ) SELECT ACCOUNT_D.ACCOUNT_KEY , BROKER_D.BROKER_KEY , CUSTOMER_D.CUSTOMER_KEY , DATE_D.DATE_KEY , EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.ACCOUNT_STATUS , EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.ACTION_TS , <?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?> , 1 , EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.ACCOUNT_ID , EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.BROKER_ID , EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.CUSTOMER_ID FROM (((<?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS", "EDW", "W") ?> EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "DATE_D", "EDW", "D") ?> DATE_D ON TRUNC(EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.ACTION_TS) = DATE_D.SQL_DATE ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "CUSTOMER_D", "EDW", "D") ?> CUSTOMER_D ON EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.CUSTOMER_ID = CUSTOMER_D.CUSTOMER_ID ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_D", "EDW", "D") ?> ACCOUNT_D ON EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.ACCOUNT_ID = ACCOUNT_D.ACCOUNT_ID ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "BROKER_D", "EDW", "D") ?> BROKER_D ON EXTRACT_ACCOUNTS_A.BROKER_ID = BROKER_D.BROKER_ID

INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL */ INTO <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_F", "EDW", "D") ?> ( ACCOUNT_KEY , BROKER_KEY , CUSTOMER_KEY , ACTIVITY_DATE_KEY , ACTIVITY_TYPE , ACTIVITY_DATE , BATCH_ID , ACTIVITY_COUNT ) SELECT ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACCOUNT_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.BROKER_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.CUSTOMER_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_DATE_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_TYPE , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_DATE , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.BATCH_ID , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_COUNT FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG", "EDW_STAGE", "D") ?> ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_TRADES", "EDW", "W") ?> ( TRADE_ID NUMBER(15), TRADE_DT DATE, STATUS_TYPE VARCHAR2(4), TRADE_TYPE VARCHAR2(3), IS_CASH NUMBER(1), SECURITY_SYMBOL VARCHAR2(15), QUANTITY NUMBER(6), BID_PRICE NUMBER(10,2), CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID NUMBER(11), EXECUTOR_ID VARCHAR2(49), TRADE_PRICE NUMBER(10,2), FEES NUMBER(10,2), COMMISSION NUMBER(10,2), TAX NUMBER(10,2), COMPANY VARCHAR2(60), COMPANY_NAME_TYPE VARCHAR2(60) )

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "TRADE_F", "EDW", "A") ?> ( BROKER_KEY NUMBER, SECURITY_KEY NUMBER, COMPANY_KEY NUMBER, CREATE_DATE_KEY NUMBER, CUSTOMER_KEY NUMBER, ACCOUNT_KEY NUMBER, EXECUTED_BY VARCHAR2(64), STATUS VARCHAR2(10), TRADE_ID NUMBER, TYPE VARCHAR2(12), CASH_FLAG VARCHAR2(1), QUANTITY NUMBER(6,0), BID_PRICE FLOAT(126), TRADE_PRICE FLOAT(126), FEE FLOAT(126), COMMISSION FLOAT(126), TAX FLOAT(126), CREATE_DATE DATE, BATCH_ID NUMBER(5,0) )

INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL */ INTO <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "TRADE_F", "EDW", "D") ?> ( BROKER_KEY , SECURITY_KEY , COMPANY_KEY , CREATE_DATE_KEY , CUSTOMER_KEY , ACCOUNT_KEY , EXECUTED_BY , STATUS , TRADE_ID , TYPE , CASH_FLAG , QUANTITY , BID_PRICE , TRADE_PRICE , FEE , COMMISSION , TAX , CREATE_DATE , BATCH_ID ) SELECT ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.BROKER_KEY , SECURITY_D.SECURITY_KEY , COMPANY_D.COMPANY_KEY , DATE_D.DATE_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.CUSTOMER_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.ACCOUNT_KEY , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.EXECUTOR_ID , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.STATUS_TYPE , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TRADE_ID , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TRADE_TYPE , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.IS_CASH , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.QUANTITY , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.BID_PRICE , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TRADE_PRICE , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.FEES , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.COMMISSION , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TAX , EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TRADE_DT , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.BATCH_ID FROM (((( SELECT ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACCOUNT_KEY AS ACCOUNT_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.BROKER_KEY AS BROKER_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.CUSTOMER_KEY AS CUSTOMER_KEY , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_DATE AS ACTIVITY_DATE , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.BATCH_ID AS BATCH_ID , ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACCOUNT_ID AS ACCOUNT_ID , RANK() over (PARTITION BY ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG.ACTIVITY_DATE DESC) AS COL FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG", "EDW_STAGE", "D") ?> ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG ) ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1 INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_TRADES", "EDW", "W") ?> EXTRACT_TRADES_A ON EXTRACT_TRADES_A.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID = ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.ACCOUNT_ID ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SECURITY_D", "EDW", "D") ?> SECURITY_D ON EXTRACT_TRADES_A.SECURITY_SYMBOL = SECURITY_D.SYMBOL ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "COMPANY_D", "EDW", "D") ?> COMPANY_D ON (CASE EXTRACT_TRADES_A.COMPANY_NAME_TYPE when 'C' then TO_CHAR(COMPANY_D.COMPANY_ID) ELSE COMPANY_D.NAME END) = EXTRACT_TRADES_A.COMPANY ) INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "DATE_D", "EDW", "D") ?> DATE_D ON TRUNC(EXTRACT_TRADES_A.TRADE_DT) = DATE_D.SQL_DATE WHERE (ACCOUNT_ACTIVITY_STG_1.COL = 1 )

SELECT TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.TRADE_ID AS TRADE_ID , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.TRADE_DT AS TRADE_DT , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.STATUS_TYPE AS STATUS_TYPE , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.TRADE_TYPE AS TRADE_TYPE , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.IS_CASH AS IS_CASH , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.SECURITY_SYMBOL AS SECURITY_SYMBOL , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.BID_PRICE AS BID_PRICE , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID AS CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.EXECUTOR_ID AS EXECUTOR_ID , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.TRADE_PRICE AS TRADE_PRICE , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.FEES AS FEES , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.COMMISSION AS COMMISSION , TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.TAX AS TAX , SEC_EXTRACT_TRADES.COMPANY AS COMPANY , (CASE LENGTH(SEC_EXTRACT_TRADES.COMPANY) WHEN 10 then 'C' ELSE 'N' END) AS COMPANY_NAME_TYPE FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "TRADE", "Trade_Data", "D") ?> TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES INNER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SEC", "Trade_Data", "D") ?> SEC_EXTRACT_TRADES ON TRA_EXTRACT_TRADES.SECURITY_SYMBOL = SEC_EXTRACT_TRADES.SYMBOL

INSERT INTO <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0EXTRACT_TRADES", "EDW", "W") ?> ( TRADE_ID, TRADE_DT, STATUS_TYPE, TRADE_TYPE, IS_CASH, SECURITY_SYMBOL, QUANTITY, BID_PRICE, CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID, EXECUTOR_ID, TRADE_PRICE, FEES, COMMISSION, TAX, COMPANY, COMPANY_NAME_TYPE ) VALUES( <?=":"+"TRADE_ID" ?> , <?=":"+"TRADE_DT" ?> , <?=":"+"STATUS_TYPE" ?> , <?=":"+"TRADE_TYPE" ?> , <?=":"+"IS_CASH" ?> , <?=":"+"SECURITY_SYMBOL" ?> , <?=":"+"QUANTITY" ?> , <?=":"+"BID_PRICE" ?> , <?=":"+"CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID" ?> , <?=":"+"EXECUTOR_ID" ?> , <?=":"+"TRADE_PRICE" ?> , <?=":"+"FEES" ?> , <?=":"+"COMMISSION" ?> , <?=":"+"TAX" ?> , <?=":"+"COMPANY" ?> , <?=":"+"COMPANY_NAME_TYPE" ?> )

CREATE TABLE TRADE_F ( TRADE_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, SK_BROKER_ID NUMBER, SK_CREATE_DATE_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, SK_CREATE_TIME_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, SK_CLOSE_DATE_ID NUMBER, SK_CLOSE_TIME_ID NUMBER, STATUS VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, TYPE VARCHAR2(12) NOT NULL, CASH_FLAG VARCHAR2(1) NOT NULL, SK_SECURITY_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, SK_COMPANY_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, QUANTITY NUMBER(6,0) NOT NULL, BID_PRICE FLOAT(126) NOT NULL, SK_CUSTOMER_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, SK_ACCOUNT_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, EXECUTED_BY VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, TRADE_PRICE FLOAT(126), FEE FLOAT(126), COMMISSION FLOAT(126), TAX FLOAT(126), BATCH_ID NUMBER(5) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT TRADE_PK PRIMARY KEY(TRADE_ID) )
